verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Spirit who broods,
Spirit who sings,
mothering bird,
peace in your wings --
Come from within, come, make us one,
come and renew the face of the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spirit of truth,
laser and light
searching the path,
seeking the right --

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit of love,
larger than law,
quick to forgive,
keeping no score --

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Spirit of hope,
never subdued,
Spirit of God,
Spirit of Good --
